ValidationRule.description:
Checks if at least 1 ODR was created upon case closure & If Outage Type was selected Old Formula:
AND(CH_Out__c = 0, ISPICKVAL(CH_Stage__c, 'Close'), ISPICKVAL(CH_Outage__c, 'Yes'), RecordType.Name = 'Nokia Incident with Restoration')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When closing a Support Ticket at least one ODR must have been created. Please Create an ODR before closing the Support Ticket
